column2: SELECT s.bestobjid, s.ra, s.dec, s.z, p.mjd, s.mjd, f.mjd_u, f.mjd_g, f.mjd_r, f.mjd_i, f.mjd_z, s.class, p.type, g.sigma_balmer, s.veldisp, e.Sigma_Ha_#, e.Sigma_Hb_# into mydb.Table_dr1#_all_AGN_# from PhotoObjAll AS p JOIN SpecObjAll AS s ON s.bestobjid = p.objid JOIN Field AS f ON f.fieldid = p.fieldid JOIN galSpecLine AS g ON g.specobjid = s.specobjid JOIN emissionLinesPort AS e on e.specobjid = s.specobjid WHERE s.z BETWEEN # AND # AND g.sigma_balmer BETWEEN # AND # AND ( (e.Sigma_Ha_# BETWEEN # AND #) OR (e.Sigma_Hb_# BETWEEN # AND #) ) AND p.type = # AND s.class = #
